benefits.title: Effects of Astaxanthin Supplementation on Skin Health: A Systematic Review of Clinical Studies
benefits.summary: Astaxanthin supplementation improves skin texture, appearance (wrinkles), and moisture content, and appears to protect against UV-induced skin damage.

benefits.title: Haematococcus astaxanthin: applications for human health and nutrition.
benefits.summary: Astaxanthin is a potent antioxidant with potential to target several health conditions and may help protect body tissues from oxidative damage.

benefits.title: Astaxanthin: Sources, Extraction, Stability, Biological Activities and Its Commercial Applications—A Review
benefits.summary: Astaxanthin is a nutritional supplement, antioxidant, anticancer agent, prevents diabetes, cardiovascular diseases, and neurodegenerative disorders, and stimulates immunization.

benefits.title: Astaxanthin: A Review of its Chemistry and Applications
benefits.summary: Astaxanthin has health benefits such as cardiovascular disease prevention, immune system boosting, bioactivity against Helycobacter pylori, and cataract prevention.
benefits.journal: Critical Reviews in Food Science and Nutrition

benefits.title: Astaxanthin: A Potential Therapeutic Agent in Cardiovascular Disease
benefits.summary: Astaxanthin has potential as a therapeutic agent in atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease due to its antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.

benefits.title: Astaxanthin in Skin Health, Repair, and Disease: A Comprehensive Review
benefits.summary: Astaxanthin possesses various health benefits and important nutraceutical applications in dermatology, potentially exerting benefits through photoprotective, antioxidant, and anti-inflammatory effects.

benefits.title: Astaxanthin as feed supplement in aquatic animals
benefits.summary: Astaxanthin improves survival, growth performance, reproductive capacity, stress tolerance, disease resistance, and immune-related gene expression in aquatic animals.

benefits.title: Neuroprotective mechanisms of astaxanthin: a potential therapeutic role in preserving cognitive function in age and neurodegeneration
benefits.summary: Astaxanthin has neuroprotective properties, including anti-inflammatory, anti-apoptotic, and antioxidant effects, and potential to promote or maintain neural plasticity, making it a promising therapeutic agent for neurodegenerative disease.

benefits.title: Free Radical Scavenging and Cellular Antioxidant Properties of Astaxanthin
benefits.summary: Astaxanthin exhibits free radical scavenging, singlet oxygen quenching, and antioxidant activities, potentially positively affecting animal and human health.

benefits.title: Effect of drying, storage temperature and air exposure on astaxanthin stability from Haematococcus pluvialis.
benefits.summary: Astaxanthin is a powerful antioxidant with various health benefits such as prevention of age-related macular degeneration and improvement of immune system, liver, and heart function.

side effects.title: Phagocytosis of Astaxanthin-Loaded Microparticles Modulates TGFβ Production and Intracellular ROS Levels in J774A.1 Macrophages
side effects.summary: Astaxanthin-loaded microparticles reduce intracellular reactive oxygen species and inhibit the release of active TGFÎ± in macrophages, potentially helping control macrophage activation.

side effects.title: Interaction between warfarin and astaxanthin: A case report.
side effects.summary: Astaxanthin supplementation may cause bleeding symptoms and potentially adverse interactions with warfarin, requiring counseling and monitoring for potential interactions.

side effects.title: Astaxantin and Isoflavones Inhibit Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia in Rats by Reducing Oxidative Stress and Normalizing Ca/Mg Balance
side effects.summary: Astaxanthin treatment resulted in decreased epithelial proliferation and normalized superoxide dismutase activity.

side effects.title: Effects of astaxanthin on VEGF level and antioxidation in human aqueous humor: difference by sex
side effects.summary: Astaxanthin affects O2•Î± scavenging activity in the aqueous humor in females, and is likely to be involved in the control of VEGF levels in the anterior eye.
side effects.journal: Journal of Clinical Biochemistry and Nutrition

side effects.title: Astaxanthin Influence on Health Outcomes of Adults at Risk of Metabolic Syndrome: A Systematic Review and Meta-Analysis
side effects.summary: Astaxanthin shows marginal effects on reducing total cholesterol and systolic blood pressure, and a significant attenuating effect on low-density lipoprotein cholesterol.

side effects.title: Effects of astaxanthin on antioxidation in human aqueous humor
side effects.summary: Astaxanthin intake enhances superoxide scavenging activity and suppresses total hydroperoxides production in human aqueous humor.
side effects.journal: Journal of Clinical Biochemistry and Nutrition

side effects.title: Hypoglycaemic effect of all-trans astaxanthin through inhibiting α-glucosidase
side effects.summary: All-trans astaxanthin has a hypoglycaemic effect by inhibiting Î± -glucosidase, in addition to its antioxidation effect for type 2 diabetes.

side effects.title: Subacute administration of Astaxanthin inhibits vitamin K-dependent clotting factors in rats.
side effects.summary: ASTX inhibits vitamin K-dependent clotting factors and may be a natural anti-coagulant with fewer side effects.

side effects.title: Astaxanthin affects oxidative stress biomarkers in methotrexate-induced hepatotoxicity
side effects.summary: Astaxanthin can be used as pretreatment in patients treated with methotrexate to decrease its hepatotoxicity by increasing GSH, SOD, and CAT while decreasing MDA.

side effects.title: The Role of the Reactive Oxygen Species Scavenger Agent, Astaxanthin, in the Protection of Cisplatin-Treated Patients Against Hearing Loss
side effects.summary: Astaxanthin has powerful anti-oxidant, anti-inflammatory, and anti-apoptotic properties, potentially protecting cisplatin-treated patients against hearing loss.

dosage.title: Astaxanthin lowers blood pressure and lessens the activity of the renin-angiotensin system in Zucker Fatty Rats
dosage.summary: High dosage of astaxanthin (25 mg/kg) significantly decreased systolic blood pressure and lessened fat oxidation in liver and kidneys.

dosage.title: Effects of astaxanthin-rich Haematococcus pluvialis extract on cognitive function: a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled study
dosage.summary: The high-dosage group (12 mg astaxanthin/day) showed improved CogHealth battery scores after 12 weeks, while the low-dosage (6 mg astaxanthin/day) group showed earlier improvements in Groton Maze Learning Test scores.
dosage.journal: Journal of Clinical Biochemistry and Nutrition

dosage.title: Effect of Astaxanthin on the Pigmentation of Goldfish Carassius auratus
dosage.summary: 36-37 mg/kg astaxanthin is the optimal dosage to stimulate fish color in goldfish Carassius auratus.
dosage.journal: Journal of The World Aquaculture Society

dosage.title: Impact of astaxanthin-enriched algal powder of Haematococcus pluvialis on memory improvement in BALB/c mice
dosage.summary: A low dosage of astaxanthin-enriched H. pluvialis powder (1.3 mg astaxanthin/kg body weight) is good for improving memory.

dosage.title: High-Dose Astaxanthin Supplementation Suppresses Antioxidant Enzyme Activity during Moderate-Intensity Swimming Training in Mice
dosage.summary: High-dose astaxanthin administration (15 and 30 mg/kg) can blunt antioxidant enzyme activity and downregulate transcription of Nrf2 and Nrf2-dependent enzymes during moderate-intensity swimming training in mice.

dosage.title: Effects of Astaxanthin Supplementation on Oxidative Stress.
dosage.summary: High dose (20 mg/day) of astaxanthin showed significant antioxidant effect, while low dose (20 mg/day) showed no significant effect.
dosage.journal: International journal for vitamin and nutrition research. Internationale Zeitschrift fur Vitamin- und Ernahrungsforschung. Journal international de vitaminologie et de nutrition

dosage.title: The effect of astaxanthin (AST) on Neurotrophin-3 (NT- 3) expression in rats after compressive spinal cord injury (SCI)"
dosage.summary: Astaxanthin at 80 mg/kg dosage can increase the expression of neurotrophin-3 in rat after compressive spinal cord injury.
dosage.journal: African Journal of Pharmacy and Pharmacology

dosage.title: Study on protective effect of astaxanthin on acute lung injury induced by lipopolysaccharide in mice
dosage.summary: Astaxanthin at doses of 10-15 mg/kg significantly decreases serum TNF-Î± and IL-8, and improves lymphocyte subpopulations in mice with acute lung injury induced by LPS.

dosage.title: Effects of Astaxanthin on osteoporosis in ovariectomized rats
dosage.summary: Astaxanthin dosages of 201510 mg/kg can ameliorate bone quality and inhibit osteoporosis in ovariectomized rat models.

dosage.title: EFFECTS OF ASTAXANTHIN ON BLOOD FAT IN RATS
dosage.summary: Astaxanthin dosages in the study were 108.4 mg/kg.bw, 217.7 mg/kg.bw, and 433.4mg/kg.bw.
